items.sentence: I\'m sorry, but I think that you\'re mistaken.
I\'m still eating dinner. I\'ll call you back.
Tom called to ask if he should bring anything.
You don\'t need to be in that much of a hurry.
You shouldn\'t ride a bicycle on the sidewalk.
There are many words that I don\'t understand.
They don\'t understand me when I speak French.
The box was so heavy that I couldn\'t lift it.
It would be a mistake to ignore Tom\'s advice.
It\'ll be hard to convince Tom not to do that.
